description: Minimalist dark theme with Jumper orange (#FA4721) accents and strategic organic gradients. Sophisticated design for professional reports and presentations with 90% grayscale, 5% orange, 5% semantic colors.

patterns.name: Cover Slide (Gradient Right)
patterns.description: Dramatic two-column split with content on left (50%) and organic gradient background on right (50%). Maximum visual impact for opening slides.
patterns.when_to_use: First slide of any presentation, major project kickoffs, cover pages requiring strong visual presence
patterns.example: RELATÓRIO DE PERFORMANCE + Período: Outubro 2024 + Cliente: Acme Corp + [organic gradient background]

patterns.name: Section Header
patterns.description: Centered layout with badge, title, and subtitle for introducing new sections or phases
patterns.when_to_use: Start of major sections, phase transitions, chapter breaks in longer presentations
patterns.example: Badge: Fase 1 + DESCOBERTA + Análise inicial do mercado

patterns.name: Cards Grid Pattern
patterns.description: Responsive auto-fit grid (3-4 columns desktop, 1 column mobile) with glass-morphism cards. Hover effects with orange glow.
patterns.when_to_use: Presenting 3-6 related items with titles and descriptions, project objectives, feature lists, context cards
patterns.example: Objetivo 1 + descrição | Objetivo 2 + 150% meta | Objetivo 3 + descrição

patterns.name: Comparison Grid (Before/After)
patterns.description: Two-column side-by-side comparison with large stats and semantic color coding. Scale-in animation on load.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing improvements, validating results, comparing two scenarios or time periods
patterns.example: Antes: R$ 2,50 CPA | Depois: R$ 0,85 CPA (-66%) com destaque em verde

patterns.name: Timeline (Temporal Evolution)
patterns.description: Horizontal timeline with 3-5 data points showing evolution. Gradient line connecting points. Sequential fade-in animation.
patterns.when_to_use: Time-series data, week-over-week changes, project phases, chronological progression

patterns.name: Data Table (Structured Comparison)
patterns.description: Table with animated rows showing structured data comparison. Semantic colors for values, badges for status.
patterns.when_to_use: Comparing metrics across channels, campaigns, or periods with detailed numerical data
patterns.example: Google Search: R$ 0,85 CPA (Excelente verde) | Meta: R$ 1,20 (Sólido azul) | Display: R$ 7,00 (Crítico vermelho)

patterns.name: Checklist (Actions Completed)
patterns.description: List with green checkmark icons and descriptions of completed items. Sequential fade-in animation.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing accomplished tasks, delivered features, completed phases, action items done
patterns.example: ✓ Otimização de Budget: Realocação de 40% do investimento | ✓ Novos Criativos: 12 variações testadas

patterns.name: Big Number (Hero Metric)
patterns.description: Large highlighted number in orange with label and context text. Success badge below. Centered layout.
patterns.when_to_use: Emphasizing the single most important metric or achievement of the presentation
patterns.example: 750 (huge orange) + Conversões Alcançadas + Crescimento de 287%... + Badge: +287% vs período

patterns.name: Closing Slide (Gradient Left)
patterns.description: Two-column split with organic gradient left (50%) and content/CTA right (50%). Glass-morphism box with action items.
patterns.when_to_use: Last slide with next steps, action items, call-to-action, strong closing impression
patterns.example: PRÓXIMOS PASSOS + [organic gradient] + Lista de ações + CTA: Agendar Reunião
